TunableList.name: BUCK_TYPE_TO_CATEGORIES_MAPPING
TunableList.description: A mapping of buck type to the categorized buck perks.

TunableEnum.name: key
TunableEnum.description: A type of bucks that this kind of tracker holds.

TunableList.name: value
TunableList.description: Ordered list of buck perks categories that will appear in the rewards UI along with the perks that belong in the category.

Tunable.name: key
Tunable.description: An integer value used to set the specific order of the categories in the UI. the lower numbers are displayed first in the UI.

TunableTuple.name: value
TunableTuple.description: Tuning structure holding all of the localized string data for the tuned Perk Category.

Tunable.name: career_level_required
Tunable.description: The minimum career level required for this perk rank to be available, 0 value means that this feature is disabled. (currently only used by Nobility Perks feature)

Tunable.name: category_name
Tunable.description: This is the localized name of the category that will show up in the bucks UI.

Tunable.name: category_tooltip
Tunable.description: This is the description that will show up when the user hovers over the catgory name for a while.

TunableList.name: rewards
TunableList.description: An ordered list of the rewards that will appear in this category.

Tunable.name: key
Tunable.description: An integer value used to order the appearance of the rewards inside of the category. The smaller numbers are sorted to the front of the list.

Tunable.name: value
Tunable.description: The Buck Perk (reward) to display in the category panel of the UI.
